title: Awakening Counsel
description: "What do you really want? And what's the best way for you to get it?" AWAKENING COUNSEL'S intertwined real life short stories demonstrate how three simple universal laws can deliver to you the knowledge of what you really want, the means to get it, and the power to heal in nearly any situation. Easy exercises at the end of the book confirm the existence and application of these universal laws to the health, wealth, and happiness in your own personal and professional life.
author: Jim Wawro
